1993#Padma Nadir Majhi#Bengali#Goutam Ghose#Ganguly plays the character of Kapila who falls for sister's husband. She was applauded for her performance as well as her apt regional accent.
1996#Yugant#Bengali#Aparna Sen#Ganguly plays the character of a dancer to whom definition of art remained restricted to its visual effect.
